title: Did a California prosecutor say that looting is "good " if suspects " need what they steal?
subtitle: In the summer of 2020, conservative websites and commentators leaked and distorted internal prosecutorial guidelines.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In the internal guidelines, Contra Costa, California, District Attorney Diana Beckton, indicated that looting was acceptable and that the suspect would not be prosecuted if "need" to be stolen.
